name: Falafel Spice Lentil Salad Sandwich Recipe
description: Falafel Spice Lentil Salad Sandwich with lemony tahini dressing. Lentils spiced with falafel spices & pickles, serve in sandwich or pita bread. Vegan Soyfree Recipe. Can be made gluten-free with a gluten-free wrap or bread.
recipeIngredient: 1.5 tbsp or more lemon or lime juice
1.5 cups cooked lentils (brown lentils or Indian brown lentils , or use cooked chickpeas or split yellow peas for variation)
1 tbsp lemon tahini dressing from above (or use 1 tbsp tahini)
2 tbsp chopped cucumber or dlll pickle
1/2  green chili or jalapeno finely chopped (or use cayenne to taste)
1/2 tsp ground cumin (preferably ground roasted cumin)
a very generous dash of cayenne and black pepper
1/3 to 1/2 tsp salt or to taste
Baby Greens or sprouts or choice

recipeInstructions.text: Mix everything under lemon tahini dressing until it is a spreadable thick mixture. Taste and adjust tang and salt.
recipeInstructions.name: Mix everything under lemon tahini dressing until it is a spreadable thick mixture. Taste and adjust tang and salt.

recipeInstructions.text: In a bowl, mix all the ingredients for the lentil salad. Taste and adjust salt, lemon and spice. Mash some of the lentils. (If using chickpeas or other larger cooked beans/lentils, process half of the larger beans with the spices, tahini and lemon juice in a processor. Mix with the rest in a bowl. Mash more if needed.)
recipeInstructions.name: In a bowl, mix all the ingredients for the lentil salad. Taste and adjust salt, lemon and spice. Mash some of the lentils. (If using chickpeas or other larger cooked beans/lentils, process half of the larger beans with the spices, tahini and lemon juice in a processor. Mix with the rest in a bowl. Mash more if needed.)

recipeInstructions.text: To make the sandwich, lightly toast the bread (optional). Slather one slice generously with the lemon tahini dressing.
recipeInstructions.name: To make the sandwich, lightly toast the bread (optional). Slather one slice generously with the lemon tahini dressing.

recipeInstructions.text: On the other slice, layer greens, cucumber/pickle and the lentil salad. Add other layers of choice like roasted veggies or sprouts.

recipeInstructions.text: Place the dressing slice on the sandwich, serve!
